definitions.definition: A state of tranquility, quiet, and harmony; absence of violence. For instance, a state free from civil disturbance.
definitions.example: Our lounge strives to maintain an environment of peace for the comfort of our customers.

definitions.definition: A state free of oppressive and unpleasant thoughts and emotions.
definitions.example: The safety equipment will give me some peace of mind.

definitions.definition: A state free of war, in particular war between different countries.
definitions.example: May there be peace in our time.

definitions.definition: To make peace; to put at peace; to be at peace.
Shut up!, silence!; be quiet, be silent.
Shortened form of peace out; goodbye.
